description: These is another famous style of bear kaomojis. These are the ones that are facing towards the right and have hands. They could be holding something, making a gesture at another bear, or shrugging their arms. Note that these emoticons do not appear correctly in every browser. As usual, I recommend you use Safari to improve the chances of these emotes coming out right.  ⁝⁞⁝⁞ʕु•̫͡•ʔु☂⁝⁞⁝⁝ ʕु-̫͡-ʔु”♬ ʕ”̮ुॽु✚⃞ྉ*✲ﾟ*｡⋆ ʕु-̫͡-ʔु” ʕु•̫͡•ʔु ✧ ʕु•̫͡•ʔु☂ ʕु-̫͡-ʔु” ʕ•̫͡•ॽु✚⃞ྉ*✲ﾟ*｡⋆  ʕु•̫͡•ʔुʔ•̫͡•ཻʕʕु•̫͡•ʔु °◦=͟͟͞͞ʕ̡̢̡ु•̫͡•ʔ̡̢̡ु ☏
title: ʕु•̫͡•ʔु Style Bears
